也有人认为这样的文字暗暗迎合了读者通过被虐幻想(masochistic fantasy)来实现快感的无意识需求。但如果引入德勒兹,我们也可以从stoicism这个角度来进行分析,从而讨论.

entry.def: Masochistic behaviour involves a person getting sexual pleasure from their own pain or suffering.

entry.tran: 受虐狂的;自虐的;自讨苦吃的
entry.def: If you describe someone's behaviour as masochistic, you mean that they seem to be trying to get into a situation which causes them suffering or great difficulty.

means.word_mean: 1. deriving pleasure or sexual gratification from being abused or dominated
